title: New: Nsolo – Eyes
body:
Super smooth new track from LA producer & writer **Nsolo**.

There’s a real classic feel to the songwriting here, whilst managing to feel resoundingly current. Production wise as well it’s simple yet undoubtedly effective, building slowly into an emotional epic. Check out _Eyes_ below.

excerpt.full: Super smooth new track from LA producer & writer Nsolo. There’s a real classic feel to the songwriting here, whilst managing to feel resoundingly current. Production wise as well it’s simple yet undoubtedly effective, building slowly into an emotional epic. Check out Eyes below.
excerpt.short: Super smooth new track from LA producer & writer Nsolo.
